phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Fix horizontal scrolling by adding proper overflow constraints to TaskCard

chunks.description: Add overflow-hidden and break-words to TaskCard to prevent long text from causing horizontal scrolling

verification.run: 1. Create a task with a very long description without spaces (e.g., 'aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa'). 2. Verify the Kanban board does not scroll horizontally. 3. Verify the text is properly truncated or wrapped within the card.

qa_signoff.verification_notes: Browser verification not possible (npm/pnpm not in allowed commands). Code review confirms correct overflow handling with overflow-hidden, break-words, and line-clamp-2 classes.
